name: Shotgun Exorcism (Meowie, teuciont)
description:
WASD/Arrow keys - Move

Left shift                       - Attack

E/Space                         - Interact

R                                        - Restart

CTRL                               - Shoot (If you had a gun)

A short game made by two people in about 72 hours for Mini Jam  #117, with the theme of ghosts!

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-117-ghosts

This was our first game and game jam, we learned a lot from the experience. Thank you for taking the time to check it out!

Credits:

Meowie: Programming, Sounds, Songs

Teuciont: Programming, Art, Room/Fight design

https://wowie-meowie.itch.io/

https://teuciont.itch.io/
